    An extreme CSS reset stylesheet, for normalising the styling of a container element and its children.

    by Premasagar Rose
        dharmafly.com

    v0.10.1

*/

.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) col,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) datalist,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) fieldset,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) main,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) map,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) meta,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) optgroup,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) output,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) progress {
  background-attachment: scroll !important;
  background-color: transparent !important;
  background-image: none !important;
  /* This rule affects the use of pngfix JavaScript http://dillerdesign.com/experiment/DD_BelatedPNG for IE6, which is used to force the browser to recognise alpha-transparent PNGs files that replace the IE6 lack of PNG transparency. (The rule overrides the VML image that is used to replace the given CSS background-image). If you don't know what that means, then you probably haven't used the pngfix script, and this comment may be ignored :) */
  background-position: 0 0 !important;
  background-repeat: repeat !important;
  border-color: black !important;
  border-color: currentColor !important;
  /* `border-color` should match font color. Modern browsers (incl. IE9) allow the use of "currentColor" to match the current font 'color' value <http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#currentcolor>. For older browsers, a default of 'black' is given before this rule. Guideline to support older browsers: if you haven't already declared a border-color for an element, be sure to do so, e.g. when you first declare the border-width. */
  border-style: none !important;
  border-width: medium !important;
  bottom: auto !important;
  clear: none !important;
  clip: auto !important;
  color: inherit !important;
  counter-increment: none !important;
  counter-reset: none !important;
  cursor: auto !important;
  direction: inherit !important;
  display: inline !important;
  float: none !important;
  font-family: inherit !important;
  /* As with other inherit values, this needs to be set on the root container element */
  font-size: inherit !important;
  font-style: inherit !important;
  font-variant: normal !important;
  font-weight: inherit !important;
  height: auto !important;
  left: auto !important;
  letter-spacing: normal !important;
  line-height: inherit !important;
  list-style-type: inherit !important;
  /* Could set list-style-type to none */
  list-style-position: outside !important;
  list-style-image: none !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
  max-height: none !important;
  max-width: none !important;
  min-height: 0 !important;
  min-width: 0 !important;
  opacity: 1;
  outline: invert none medium !important;
  overflow: visible !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
  position: static !important;
  quotes: "" "" !important;
  right: auto !important;
  table-layout: auto !important;
  text-align: inherit !important;
  text-decoration: inherit !important;
  text-indent: 0 !important;
  text-transform: none !important;
  top: auto !important;
  unicode-bidi: normal !important;
  vertical-align: baseline !important;
  visibility: inherit !important;
  white-space: normal !important;
  width: auto !important;
  word-spacing: normal !important;
  z-index: auto !important;
  /* CSS3 */
  /* Including all prefixes according to http://caniuse.com/ */
  /* CSS Animations don't cascade, so don't require resetting */
  -webkit-background-origin: padding-box !important;
  background-origin: padding-box !important;
  -webkit-background-clip: border-box !important;
  background-clip: border-box !important;
  -webkit-background-size: auto !important;
  -moz-background-size: auto !important;
  background-size: auto !important;
  -webkit-border-image: none !important;
  -moz-border-image: none !important;
  -o-border-image: none !important;
  border-image: none !important;
  -webkit-border-radius: 0 !important;
  -moz-border-radius: 0 !important;
  border-radius: 0 !important;
  -webkit-box-shadow: none !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  -webkit-box-sizing: content-box !important;
  -moz-box-sizing: content-box !important;
  box-sizing: content-box !important;
  -webkit-column-count: auto !important;
  -moz-column-count: auto !important;
  column-count: auto !important;
  -webkit-column-gap: normal !important;
  -moz-column-gap: normal !important;
  column-gap: normal !important;
  -webkit-column-rule: medium none black !important;
  -moz-column-rule: medium none black !important;
  column-rule: medium none black !important;
  -webkit-column-span: 1 !important;
  -moz-column-span: 1 !important;
  /* doesn't exist yet but probably will */
  column-span: 1 !important;
  -webkit-column-width: auto !important;
  -moz-column-width: auto !important;
  column-width: auto !important;
  font-feature-settings: normal !important;
  overflow-x: visible !important;
  overflow-y: visible !important;
  -webkit-hyphens: manual !important;
  -moz-hyphens: manual !important;
  hyphens: manual !important;
  -webkit-perspective: none !important;
  -moz-perspective: none !important;
  -ms-perspective: none !important;
  -o-perspective: none !important;
  perspective: none !important;
  -webkit-perspective-origin: 50% 50% !important;
  -moz-perspective-origin: 50% 50% !important;
  -ms-perspective-origin: 50% 50% !important;
  -o-perspective-origin: 50% 50% !important;
  perspective-origin: 50% 50% !important;
  -webkit-backface-visibility: visible !important;
  -moz-backface-visibility: visible !important;
  -ms-backface-visibility: visible !important;
  -o-backface-visibility: visible !important;
  backface-visibility: visible !important;
  text-shadow: none !important;
  /*  -webkit-transition: all 0s ease 0s !important;
  transition: all 0s ease 0s !important;
  -webkit-transform: none !important;
  -moz-transform: none !important;
  -ms-transform: none !important;
  -o-transform: none !important;
  transform: none !important;
  -webkit-transform-origin: 50% 50% !important;
  -moz-transform-origin: 50% 50% !important;
  -ms-transform-origin: 50% 50% !important;
  -o-transform-origin: 50% 50% !important;
  transform-origin: 50% 50% !important;
  -webkit-transform-style: flat !important;
  -moz-transform-style: flat !important;
  -ms-transform-style: flat !important;
  -o-transform-style: flat !important;
  transform-style: flat !important;*/
  word-break: normal !important;
}

.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) h4,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) h5,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) h6 {
  font-weight: bold !important;
}

  font-size: 2em !important;
  padding: .67em 0 !important;
}

  font-size: 1.5em !important;
  padding: .83em 0 !important;
}

  font-size: 1.17em !important;
  padding: .83em 0 !important;
}

  font-size: 1em !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) h5 {
  font-size: .83em !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) p {
  margin: 1em 0 !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) table {
  display: table !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) thead {
  display: table-header-group !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) tbody {
  display: table-row-group !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) tfoot {
  display: table-footer-group !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) tr {
  display: table-row !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) th,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) td {
  display: table-cell !important;
  padding: 2px !important;
}
/* == SPECIFIC ELEMENTS == */
/* Some of these are browser defaults; some are just useful resets */
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul {
  margin: 1em 0 !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul li,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ul li,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ul ul li,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol li,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ol li,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ol ol li,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ol ol li,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ul ol li,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ul ul li,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ol ul li {
  list-style-position: inside !important;
  margin-top: .08em !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ol,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ol ol,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ul ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ul ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ol ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ol,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ol ol,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ul ol {
  padding-left: 40px !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
}
/* helper for general navigation */
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) nav ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) nav ol {
  list-style-type: none !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) menu {
  list-style-type: disc !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol {
  list-style-type: decimal !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) menu ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol menu,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul menu,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) menu menu {
  list-style-type: circle !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ol ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ul ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol menu ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ol menu,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol ul menu,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ol menu menu,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ol ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ul ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul menu ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ol menu,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul ul menu,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ul menu menu,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) menu ol ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) menu ul ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) menu menu ul,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) menu ol menu,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) menu ul menu,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) menu menu menu {
  list-style-type: square !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) li {
  display: list-item !important;
  /* Fixes IE7 issue with positioning of nested bullets */
  min-height: auto !important;
  min-width: auto !important;
  padding-left: 20px !important;
  /* replace -webkit-padding-start: 40px; */
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) strong {
  font-weight: bold !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) em {
  font-style: italic !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) kbd,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) samp,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) code,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) pre {
  font-family: monospace !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) a,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) a:hover {
  color: blue !important;
  text-decoration: underline !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) a:visited {
  color: #529 !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) a,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) a *,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=submit],
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=button],
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=radio],
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=checkbox],
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) select,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) button {
  cursor: pointer !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) button,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=submit] {
  text-align: center !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
  border-radius: 0 !important;
  text-decoration: none !important;
  font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif !important;
  font-size: small !important;
  background: none !important;
  color: buttontext !important;
  border: none !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  outline: initial !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) button:active,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=submit]:active,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=button]:active,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) button:active {
  background: none !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=hidden] {
  display: none !important;
}
/* restore form defaults */
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) textarea {
  -webkit-appearance: textarea !important;
  background: white !important;
  padding: 2px !important;
  margin-left: 4px !important;
  word-wrap: break-word !important;
  white-space: pre-wrap !important;
  font-size: 11px !important;
  font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif !important;
  line-height: 13px !important;
  resize: both !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) select,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) textarea,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input {
  border: 1px solid #ccc !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) select {
  font-size: 11px !important;
  font-family: helvetica, arial, sans-serif !important;
  display: inline-block;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) textarea:focus,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input:focus {
  outline: auto 5px -webkit-focus-ring-color !important;
  outline: initial !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=text] {
  background: white !important;
  padding: 1px !important;
  font-family: initial !important;
  font-size: small !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=checkbox],
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=radio] {
  border: 1px #2b2b2b solid !important;
  border-radius: 4px !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=checkbox],
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=radio] {
  outline: initial !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input[type=radio] {
  margin: 2px 2px 3px 2px !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) abbr[title],
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) acronym[title],
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) dfn[title] {
  cursor: help !important;
  border-bottom-width: 1px !important;
  border-bottom-style: dotted !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) ins {
  background-color: #ff9 !important;
  color: black !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) del {
  text-decoration: line-through !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) blockquote,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) q {
  quotes: none !important;
  /* HTML5 */
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) blockquote:before,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) blockquote:after,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) q:before,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) q:after,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) li:before,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) li:after {
  content: "" !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) input,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) select {
  vertical-align: middle !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) table {
  border-collapse: collapse !important;
  border-spacing: 0 !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) hr {
  display: block !important;
  height: 1px !important;
  border: 0 !important;
  border-top: 1px solid #ccc !important;
  margin: 1em 0 !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) *[dir=rtl] {
  direction: rtl !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) mark {
  background-color: #ff9 !important;
  color: black !important;
  font-style: italic !important;
  font-weight: bold !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) menu {
  padding-left: 40px !important;
  padding-top: 8px !important;
}
/* additional helpers */
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) [hidden],
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) template {
  display: none !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) abbr[title] {
  border-bottom: 1px dotted !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) sub,
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) sup {
  font-size: 75% !important;
  line-height: 0 !important;
  position: relative !important;
  vertical-align: baseline !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) sup {
  top: -0.5em !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) sub {
  bottom: -0.25em !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) img {
  border: 0 !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) figure {
  margin: 0 !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) textarea {
  overflow: auto !important;
  vertical-align: top !important;
}
/* == ROOT CONTAINER ELEMENT == */
/* This contains default values for child elements to inherit  */
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) {
  font-size: medium !important;
  line-height: 1 !important;
  direction: ltr !important;
  text-align: left !important;
  /* for IE, Opera */
  text-align: start !important;
  /* recommended W3C Spec */
  font-family: "Times New Roman", Times, serif !important;
  /* Override this with whatever font-family is required */
  color: black !important;
  font-style: normal !important;
  font-weight: normal !important;
  text-decoration: none !important;
  list-style-type: disc !important;
}
.cleanslate-syte:not(.ReactCrop) pre {
  white-space: pre !important;
}
.r-ss-selected .filter--select-checkbox {
  background: #3ccbc6 url("//cdn.syteapi.com/assets/imajs/0kwalf9c8/images/fi-check.svg") no-repeat center center;
  background-size: 77%;
  border: none;
}
.filter--select {
  width: 100%;
}
.filter--select-checkbox {
  height: 1.1666666667em;
  width: 1.1666666667em;
  display: inline-block;
  border: 1px solid #b7b7b7;
  border-radius: 2px;
  margin: 0.5em 0.833333333em 0.5em 0.2em;
}

  @import "../node_modules/perfect-scrollbar/dist/css/perfect-scrollbar.min.css";

}

  visibility: hidden !important;
}

  width: 4px !important;
  opacity: 1 !important;
  visibility: visible !important;
}

  width: 4px !important;
  opacity: 1 !important;
  visibility: visible !important;
}

  display: none !important;
}
.syte-image-decoration {
  position: absolute;
  top: 10px;
  right: 10px;
  height: 50px;
  width: 50px;
  background-image: url("//cdn.syteapi.com/assets/imajs/0kwalf9c8/images/crop_button.svg");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: 0 0;
  background-size: contain;
  z-index: 100;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: auto;
}
.syte-image-decoration:hover ~ .image-decoration-animation .image-decoration-animation-1,
.syte-image-decoration.hover ~ .image-decoration-animation .image-decoration-animation-1 {
  transform: scale(2.9);
  -webkit-transform: scale(2.9);
}
.syte-image-decoration:hover ~ .image-decoration-animation .image-decoration-animation-2,
.syte-image-decoration.hover ~ .image-decoration-animation .image-decoration-animation-2 {
  transform: scale(4.2);
  -webkit-transform: scale(4.2);
}
.syte-image-decoration:hover ~ .image-decoration-animation .image-decoration-animation-3,
.syte-image-decoration.hover ~ .image-decoration-animation .image-decoration-animation-3 {
  transform: scale(5.3);
  -webkit-transform: scale(5.3);
}
.image-decoration-animation {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  width: 260px;
  height: 260px;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.image-decoration-animation-1,
.image-decoration-animation-2,
.image-decoration-animation-3 {
  position: absolute;
  top: 10px;
  right: 10px;
  height: 50px;
  width: 50px;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25);
  border-radius: 50%;
  transform-origin: center center;
  -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.7s;
  transition: transform 0.7s;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
}
.image-decoration-wrapper {
  position: relative;
  pointer-events: none;
}
.image-decoration-wrapper > img {
  pointer-events: auto;
}
.image-decoration-bb {
  display: inline-block;
  position: absolute;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none;
  z-index: 100;
  pointer-events: none;
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
}
.image-decoration-bb.pointerevents {
  pointer-events: auto;
}
.image-decoration-bb.hidden {
  opacity: 0;
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-point {
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  width: 22px;
  height: 22px;
  margin: -11px 0 0 -11px;
  padding: 0;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: 0 0;
  background-size: contain;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: auto;
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-point:after {
  position: absolute !important;
  width: 100% !important;
  height: 100% !important;
  background: url("//cdn.syteapi.com/assets/imajs/0kwalf9c8/icons/plus-point.svg") no-repeat center !important;
  background-size: contain !important;
  cursor: pointer !important;
  content: '' !important;
  z-index: 1 !important;
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-point.selected,
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-point.bb-hover,
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-point:hover {
  transform: scale(1.21, 1.21);
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-point.hidden {
  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-point .image-decoration-bb-toggle {
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  width: 45px;
  height: 45px;
  top: 15px;
  left: 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-image: url("//cdn.syteapi.com/assets/imajs/0kwalf9c8/images/boxes_on.svg");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: 0 0;
  background-size: contain;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: auto;
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-point .image-decoration-bb-toggle.active,
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-point .image-decoration-bb-toggle:not(.active):hover {
  opacity: 0.5;
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-point .image-decoration-bb-toggle.active:hover {
  opacity: 1;
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-price-tag {
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  width: 35px;
  height: 35px;
  margin: -11px 0 0 -11px;
  padding: 0;
  background-image: url("//cdn.syteapi.com/assets/imajs/0kwalf9c8/images/price_tag.png");

  background-position: 0 0;
  background-size: contain;
  transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: auto;
  opacity: 0.7;
}

  display: block;
  content: '';
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: transparent;
  margin-top: -15px;
  margin-left: -15px;
  opacity: 0;
}

}

  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0.45;
  border: 2px solid #ffffff;
  border-radius: 3px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), inset 0 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease-in;
  background: none;
  pointer-events: auto;
}

.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-bound.bb-hover,
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-bound:hover {

  border-width: 2px;

  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: center center;
  background-size: 20px;
}

  background: none;
}

  display: block;
  content: '';
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  background: transparent;
  margin-top: -10px;
  margin-left: -10px;
  opacity: 0;
}

  opacity: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}
.image-decoration-bb.bb-flicker-2 .image-decoration-bb-bound {
  animation: bb-opacity-flicker-2 1.7s ease-out;
  animation-direction: alternate;
  -webkit-animation: bb-opacity-flicker-2 1.7s ease-out;
  -webkit-animation-direction: alternate;
  -moz--animation: bb-opacity-flicker-2 1.7s ease-out;
  -moz--animation-direction: alternate;
  -o-animation: bb-opacity-flicker-2 1.7s ease-out;
  -o-animation-direction: alternate;
}
.image-decoration-bb.bb-flicker-border .image-decoration-bb-bound {
  animation: bb-opacity-flicker-border 1.5s ease;
  animation-direction: alternate;
  -webkit-animation: bb-opacity-flicker-border 1.5s ease;
  -webkit-animation-direction: alternate;
  -moz--animation: bb-opacity-flicker-border 1.5s ease;
  -moz--animation-direction: alternate;
  -o-animation: bb-opacity-flicker-border 1.5s ease;
  -o-animation-direction: alternate;
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-toggle {
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  width: 45px;
  height: 45px;
  top: 15px;
  left: 15px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-image: url("//cdn.syteapi.com/assets/imajs/0kwalf9c8/images/boxes_on.svg");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: 0 0;
  background-size: contain;
  cursor: pointer;
  pointer-events: auto;
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-toggle.active,
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-toggle:not(.active):hover {
  opacity: 0.5;
}
.image-decoration-bb .image-decoration-bb-toggle.active:hover {
  opacity: 1;
}
@keyframes bb-opacity-flicker-2 {
  30%,
  70% {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
  }
  0%,
  50%,
  100% {
    background-color: rgba(96, 193, 255, 0);
  }
}
@-webkit-keyframes bb-opacity-flicker-2 {
  30%,
  70% {
    background-color: rgba(96, 193, 255, 0.95);
  }
  0%,
  50%,
  100% {
    background-color: rgba(96, 193, 255, 0);
  }
}
@-moz-keyframes bb-opacity-flicker-2 {
  30%,
  70% {
    background-color: rgba(96, 193, 255, 0.95);
  }
  0%,
  50%,
  100% {
    background-color: rgba(96, 193, 255, 0);
  }
}
@-o-keyframes bb-opacity-flicker-2 {
  30%,
  70% {
    background-color: rgba(96, 193, 255, 0.95);
  }
  0%,
  50%,
  100% {
    background-color: rgba(96, 193, 255, 0);
  }
}
@keyframes bb-opacity-flicker-border {
  0%,
  65% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  45%,
  100% {
    opacity: 0.45;
  }
}
@-webkit-keyframes bb-opacity-flicker-border {
  0%,
  65% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  45%,
  100% {
    opacity: 0.45;
  }
}
@-moz-keyframes bb-opacity-flicker-border {
  0%,
  65% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  45%,
  100% {
    opacity: 0.45;
  }
}
@-o-keyframes bb-opacity-flicker-border {
  0%,
  65% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  45%,
  100% {
    opacity: 0.45;
  }
}
#imajs-overlay-- {
  font-family: sans-serif !important;
  left: 0 !important;
  right: 0 !important;
  top: 0 !important;
  bottom: 0 !important;
  position: fixed !important;
  z-index: 9999999999 !important;
  display: none !important;
  transition: background-color 0.5s ease-in-out !important;
  text-align: left !important;
  font-size: 12px !important;
  direction: ltr !important;
}
#imajs-overlay--.overlay-show {
  display: block !important;
}
#imajs-overlay-- * {
  box-sizing: border-box !important;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;
}
#imajs-overlay-- .clearfix-imajs:after {
  content: " " !important;
  /* Older browser do not support empty content */
  visibility: hidden !important;
  display: block !important;
  height: 0 !important;
  clear: both !important;
}
#imajs-overlay-- h1,
#imajs-overlay-- h2 {
  display: block !important;
  text-transform: capitalize !important;
}
#imajs-overlay-- .masonry {
  line-height: 17px !important;
  letter-spacing: 0.48px !important;
}
#imajs-overlay-- .stick-to-right {
  margin-right: 20px !important;
}
#imajs-overlay-- .u-text-center {
  text-align: center !important;
}
#imajs-overlay-- .u-vcenter {
  display: inline-block !important;
  width: 100% !important;
  vertical-align: middle !important;
}
#imajs-overlay-- .u-scrollable {
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch !important;
}

  overflow: hidden !important;
}

    position: fixed !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    height: 100% !important;
    max-height: 100% !important;
    top: 0 !important;
    left: 0 !important;
  }
}

  display: block !important;
}

  visibility: hidden;

  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  height: 100vh;
  width: 100vw;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85);
  z-index: 9999999999;
}

1);break}c.forEach(function(f){var g=m(a,f);g&&a.push(f)})}return e(a)}catch(f){return e()}};e.fn.filter=function(a){try{var b=a.replace(":","").split("(")[0],c=q(a);return e(p(this.nodes,b,c))}catch(d){return e()}};e.fn.is=function(a){try{for(var b=0;b<this.length;b++){a:{var c=this[b],d=a,f=c.matches||c.matchesSelector||c.msMatchesSelector||c.mozMatchesSelector||c.webkitMatchesSelector||c.oMatchesSelector;if(f)var g=f.call(c,d);else{for(var h=c.parentNode.querySelectorAll(d),k=h.length;k--;)if(h[k]===

	<script type="text/javascript">
    var digitalData = digitalData ||{};
    
            function extend(target, obj){
            	Object.keys(obj).forEach(function(key){
            		target[key] = obj[key];
            	});
            	
            	return target;
            }

<script>
  var links = document.querySelectorAll('.fbra_paymentIcons__list a');
  if( links.length > 0 ) {
  	for(var i=0; i < links.length; i++) {
      links[i].setAttribute('onclick','event.preventDefault()');
    }
  }
  
  $(document).ready(function(){
    
    //Cambio de numero header
    $('body > header > div > div > div.fbra_ayuda__tel > a:nth-child(2)').html('01 8000 958787');
    
		
    // quitar horas de las fechas de envio
      var $fbra_deliveryDates = $('#fbra_checkoutDeliverySummary > div > div > div > div > .fbra_deliveryDate');
      var rexDelivery = new RegExp(/ \d\d:\d\d a \d\d:\d\d/);

      $fbra_deliveryDates.each(function(index){
           var dateText = $(this).text();
           if( rexDelivery.test(dateText) ) {
                $(this).html(dateText.replace( / \d\d:\d\d a \d\d:\d\d/ , ''));
            }
            else if( dateText.indexOf(' entre') !== -1 ) {
                $(this).html($(this).text().slice(0, $(this).text().indexOf(' entre')));
            }
      });
    
    if( $('#fbra_checkoutConfirmationOrderPaymentSummary > div > div > div.fbra_paymentMethod.fbra_test_paymentMethod > div > div.fbra_paymentMode.fbra_test_paymentMode > span.fbra_test_paymentMode__value').text() === 'Cash' ) {
    	$('#fbra_checkoutConfirmationOrderPaymentSummary > div > div > div.fbra_paymentMethod.fbra_test_paymentMethod > div > div.fbra_paymentMode.fbra_test_paymentMode > span.fbra_test_paymentMode__value').text('Efectivo');
    }
    
    if( _satellite.getVar('ecom_shippingMethod') === "PCE-RF" || _satellite.getVar('ecom_shippingMethod') === "PCE-FP") {
    	$('.fbra_test_paymentMode__value').html('Pago ContraEntrega');
      $('.fbra_cashOnDeliveryText ').hide();
      $('.fbra_paymentInstructions ').hide();
    }				
      
  });
</script><script>_satellite["_runScript1"](function(event, target, Promise) {
function changeText(){
    var element_title = document.querySelector('[class*="--pseCard"] .fbra_paymentOptionsExternalPaymentData__title');
    var title = element_title.textContent;
    if(/billeteras/.test(title)) return;
    var newTitle = title += ' / billeteras';
    element_title.innerText = newTitle;
}

function checkCurrentTabOptions(){
    var otherPayments = document.querySelector('.fbra_paymentOptionsTab__3');
    var otherPaymentsActive = /--active/.test(otherPayments.className);
    var inputAplazarPago = document.querySelector('[class*="--pseCard"]');
    // check for both variables to be true
    if(otherPaymentsActive && inputAplazarPago){
        //create interval to check for 'fbra_button--disabled'
        var checkForStateInterval = setInterval(function(e){
            // if 'fbra_button--disabled' exist and have text 'seleccionado'
            var checkPSE = document.querySelector('.fbra_button--disabled');
            if(checkPSE && /seleccionado/.test(checkPSE.innerText.toLowerCase())){
                changeText();
                clearInterval(checkForStateInterval);
            }else{
                changeText();
                clearInterval(checkForStateInterval);
            }
        });
    }
}

function checkForElement(callback, element){
    var el = element;
    var interval = setInterval(function(e){
        var theElement = document.getElementById(el) || document.querySelectorAll(el);
        if(theElement.length === 0 || theElement === null) return;
        callback();
        clearInterval(interval);
    }, 400);
}

function changingBetweenTabs(){
    var tabOtherPayments = document.querySelector('.fbra_paymentOptionsTab__3');
    if(tabOtherPayments){
        tabOtherPayments.addEventListener('click', function(e){
            checkForElement(function(){
                checkCurrentTabOptions();
            },'[class*="--pseCard"]');
        });
    }
}

function intercepter(callback) {
    var oldXHROpen = window.XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open;
    window.XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open = function (method, url, async, user, password) {
        // do something with the method, url and etc.
        this.addEventListener('load', function (e) {
            //console.log('load: ' + this.responseURL);
            var checkJsonParse = JSON.parse(this.response) ? JSON.parse(this.response) : this.response;
            var thisResponse = this.response !== '' && this.response !== undefined ? checkJsonParse : this.response;
            callback(this.readyState, this.responseURL, thisResponse);
        });
        return oldXHROpen.apply(this, arguments);
    }
}

function validatePage(){
    if(!/payment/.test(window.location.href)) return;
    // when user already is in other Payments tab
    checkCurrentTabOptions();
    // when user is changing between tabs constantly
    changingBetweenTabs();
    // when user execute 'PaymentActor/submit-external..etc'
    intercepter(function(state, url, res){
        if(state !== 4) return;
        if(!/otherPaymentOption/.test(url)) return;
        checkCurrentTabOptions();
    })
}
validatePage();
// https://secure.falabella.com.co/rest/model/falabella/rest/purchase/PaymentActor/submit-external-or-otherPaymentOption
});</script><noscript>

<script>_satellite["_runScript3"](function(event, target, Promise) {
var queueitOne=document.querySelector('#queueitOne');
var queueitTwo=document.querySelector('#queueitTwo');
var ourHeader=document.querySelector('head');

ourHeader.appendChild(queueitOne);
ourHeader.appendChild(queueitTwo);
});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript4"](function(event, target, Promise) {
function checkJota(int) {

    var jotaObject = {};
    digitalData.ecom.productList.forEach(function(el) {
        var jota = el.backendCategory.slice(0, int);
        if (jotaObject[jota] === undefined) {
            jotaObject[jota] = el.price * el.quantity;
        } else {
            jotaObject[jota] = jotaObject[jota] + (el.price * el.quantity);
        }
    });

    var finalJota;
    Object.keys(jotaObject).forEach(function(el) {
        if (finalJota === undefined) {
            finalJota = el;
        } else {
 
            finalJota = jotaObject[finalJota] > jotaObject[el] ? finalJota : el;

        }

    });
    return finalJota;

}
var checkoutLinea;
var checkoutSublinea;
if (digitalData.ecom && digitalData.ecom.productList && digitalData.ecom.productList[0] && digitalData.ecom.productList[0].backendCategory) {
    checkoutLinea = checkJota(3);
    checkoutSublinea = checkJota(5);
} else {
    checkoutLinea = null;
    checkoutSublinea = null;
}


var appmedallia="web";
if(_satellite.cookie.get('dtm_appmedallia')){
  appmedallia="app";
}
var newObject ={
        'no_show': _satellite.getVar('noShow'),
        'app':appmedallia,
        'j_linea':checkoutLinea,
        'j_sublinea':checkoutSublinea
    };


digitalData.medalliaParameters = newObject;
});</script><script type="text/javascript" src="https://resources.digital-cloud.medallia.com/wdcus/55961/onsite/embed.js" async=""></script>  
<!-- Twitter universal website tag code -->

},s.version='1.1',s.queue=[],u=t.createElement(n),u.async=!0,u.src='//static.ads-twitter.com/uwt.js',

twq('track','PageView');

</script>

<!-- End Twitter universal website tag code --><script src="//cdn.syteapi.com/assets/imajs/imajs.js?a=8344&amp;sig=5e2727779b2bac61768c4661&amp;languageCode=es_CO" async=""></script>
<script>_satellite["_runScript5"](function(event, target, Promise) {
if(/conf/i.test(document.URL) && (_satellite.getVar('ecom_orderId')||_satellite.getVar('ecom_purchaseID'))){
		syteDataLayer = window.syteDataLayer || [];
		syteDataLayer.push({
			name: 'checkout_complete',
			tag: 'ecommerce',
            id:_satellite.getVar('ecom_orderId')||_satellite.getVar('ecom_purchaseID'),
			value: getTotal(),
			currency: 'COP',
			products: getProd()
		});
}else{
	syteDataLayer = window.syteDataLayer || [];
		syteDataLayer.push({
			name: 'fe_page_view',
			tag: 'ecommerce'
		});
}

function getProd() {
	var prodsArr = []
	digitalData.ecom.productList.forEach(function (el) {
		var tempObj = {
			'sku': el.sku,
			'price': el.price,
			'quantity': el.quantity
		};
		prodsArr.push(tempObj);
	});
	return prodsArr;
}

function getTotal() {
	var total = 0;
	digitalData.ecom.productList.forEach(function (el) {
		total = el.price + total;
	})
	return total;
}
});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript6"](function(event, target, Promise) {
(function(open){
    XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open = function(method, url, async, user, pass) {
        this.addEventListener("readystatechange", function() {
            if(this.responseURL.match(/\/add-coupon|set-selected-coupon/)){
                if(this.readyState === 4){
                    var theResponse = JSON.parse(this.response);
                    if(theResponse.success === true){
                        sessionStorage.setItem('selectedCoupon', theResponse.coupons[0].promotionId);
                    }
                }
            } else if(this.responseURL.match(/\/remove-coupon/)){
               if(this.readyState === 4){
                    var theResponse = JSON.parse(this.response);
                    if(theResponse.success === true){
                        sessionStorage.removeItem('selectedCoupon');
                    }
                }
            }
        }, false);
        open.call(this, method, url, async, user, pass);
    };
})(XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open);

if(digitalData.ecom.hasOwnProperty('promociones')){
    sessionStorage.setItem('selectedCoupon', digitalData.ecom.promociones);
}
});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript7"](function(event, target, Promise) {
var tabCmr = document.querySelector(".fbra_paymentOptionsTab__1");

    tabCmr.style.display = 'none';

    var h3TextoTab = document.querySelector(".fbra_paymentOptionsTab__2").querySelector("h3");
    h3TextoTab.innerHTML = "CMR y otras tarjetas de cr\u00E9dito";

    setInterval(function(){

        var tarjetasCredito = document.querySelector(".fbra_list_ico_cards");
        if (tarjetasCredito) {
            tarjetasCredito.style.display = 'none';
        }
    }
    , 100);
}

});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript8"](function(event, target, Promise) {
function changeCmrText() {
    var cmrTab = document.querySelector(".fbra_paymentOptionsTab__1");
    if (cmrTab) {
        var cmrSpan = document.querySelector(".fbra_cardDetails__endingInText");
        if (cmrTab.classList.contains("fbra_tab--active") && cmrSpan) {
            var endsWith = cmrSpan.innerText.match(/\d+/);
            cmrSpan.innerText = "CMR Mastercard terminada en: " + endsWith;
        }
        var cmrType = document.querySelector(".fbra_cardBookItem__cardTextType");
        if (cmrTab.classList.contains("fbra_tab--active") && cmrType) {

            cmrType.innerText = "CMR Mastercard";
        }

    } else {
        console.log("clearing");
        clearInterval(changeCmrTextInterval);
    }
}

//remove this if when QP goes into production

    var changeCmrTextInterval = setInterval(function(){
        changeCmrText();
    }
    , 50);



});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript9"](function(event, target, Promise) {
//check every second if tab 3 is active AND if it has a text input. If so, change the type to password.
setInterval(function() {
    var thirdTab = document.querySelector('.fbra_paymentOptionsTab__3');
    if (thirdTab && thirdTab.classList.contains('fbra_tab--active')) {
        var dnInput = document.querySelector('#userIdNumber');
        if (dnInput && dnInput.type === "text") {
            dnInput.type = "password"
        }

    }

}, 500);

});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript10"](function(event, target, Promise) {

This probably means that the value for the 'insertInto' parameter is invalid.");var r=c[c.length-1];if("top"===t.insertAt)r?r.nextSibling?n.insertBefore(e,r.nextSibling):n.appendChild(e):n.insertBefore(e,n.firstChild),c.push(e);else });</script><script>_satellite["_runScript11"](function(event, target, Promise) {
var myInterval = setInterval(
  function() {
      // Obtener el boton de login de Facebook
      var loginFacebook = document.querySelector('.fbra_socialSignInOptions__facebookButton.fbra_test_socialSignInOptions__facebookButton');
      if (loginFacebook) {
          // Obtener el padre de Login de Facebook
        var fatherLoginFacebook = loginFacebook.parentElement;
        fatherLoginFacebook.removeChild(loginFacebook);
        clearInterval(myInterval); 
      }
}, 100);
});</script><style>
  .new-text-terms-conditions {
    font-size: 14px;
    padding: 0px 30px;
    width: 60%
  }
  
  .new-text-terms-conditions-mobile {
    font-size: 14px;
    text-align: justify;
    padding: 0px 20px 0px 25px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
</style><script>_satellite["_runScript12"](function(event, target, Promise) {
function isDeviceMobile() {
  var isMobile = false;
  if (/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|BB|PlayBook|IEMobile|Windows Phone|Kindle|Silk|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
      isMobile = true;
  }
  return isMobile;
}

function insertTextPagePayment() {
  console.log('New Text into payment');

  var sectionTerms = document.querySelector('section.fbra_section.fbra_continueButton.fbra_test_continueButton');
  
  var newDiv = document.createElement("div");
  newDiv.setAttribute("id", "idNewElement");
  var textBuyFaco = 'Con esta compra acumulars CMR Puntos con los que podrs acceder a los beneficios de este Programa.';
  var newContent = document.createTextNode(textBuyFaco);
  newDiv.appendChild(newContent);
  newDiv.classList.add('new-text-terms-conditions');

  sectionTerms.appendChild(newDiv);
}

function insertTextPagePaymentMobile() {
  
    console.log('New Text into payment Mobile');

    var newDiv = document.createElement("div");
    newDiv.setAttribute("id", "idNewElement");
    var textBuyFaco = 'Con esta compra acumulars CMR Puntos con los que podrs acceder a los beneficios de este Programa.';
    var newContent = document.createTextNode(textBuyFaco);
    newDiv.appendChild(newContent);
    newDiv.classList.add('new-text-terms-conditions-mobile');

    var anchoresPayment = document.querySelectorAll('a');
    var anchoreReservation = '';

    anchoresPayment.forEach(el => {
      if(el.innerText === 'Trminos y Condiciones') {
        anchoreReservation = el;
      }
    });

    var fatherAnchoreTermsAndConditions = anchoreReservation.closest('.fbra_continueButtonWrapper');
    fatherAnchoreTermsAndConditions.insertBefore(newDiv, fatherAnchoreTermsAndConditions.childNodes[1]);
}

var myInterval = setInterval(
  function() {
      var sectionTermsValidate = document.querySelector('section.fbra_section.fbra_continueButton.fbra_test_continueButton');
      var newElement = document.querySelector('#idNewElement');
    
      if (sectionTermsValidate && !newElement) {
        if(isDeviceMobile()) {
          insertTextPagePaymentMobile();
        } else {
          insertTextPagePayment();
        }
        
      } 
}, 1000);
});</script>

product.variantId){quantity=product.quantity.quantityNumber;if(quantity>1)quantityPrice=parsePrice(product)*quantity;else quantityPrice=parsePrice(product);pricesList.push(quantityPrice);concatQuantity=parseInt(quantity)+concatQuantity;nameProduct.push(product.name)}})});var concatPrice=pricesList.reduce(function(acc,val){return acc+val},0);concatName=nameProduct.join().replace(/,/g," - ")}window.dataLayer.push({"category":"ui :: despacho","action":"guardar para despues","label":concatName,"price wishlist":concatPrice,
"quantity wishlist":concatQuantity})}}catch(error){}})}catch(error){handleError(error)}try{mh$(document).on("focusout",function(event){try{var target=mh$(event.target);var category="error";var action=target.text();var label=target.text();var errorField=mh$("span .high.normal");var streetError=target.closest("#testId-Input-street");var numberError=target.closest("#testId-Input-number");var nameError=target.closest("#testId-Input-name");var lastnameError=target.closest("#testId-Input-lastName");var phoneError=
target.closest("#testId-Input-phone");var dniError=target.closest("#testId-Input-dni");if(target.closest("#testId-Input-email").length>0){if(errorField.length>0)pushEvent(category,"Ingresar email para continuar :: despacho",errorField.text())}else if(streetError.length>0){if(streetError.val()==="")pushEvent(category,"Ingresar una direcci\u00f3n :: despacho",streetError.closest("div .cell")[0].parentNode.querySelector(".primary.high.normal").textContent)}else if(numberError.length>0){if(numberError.val()===
"")pushEvent(category,"Ingresar una direcci\u00f3n :: despacho",numberError.closest("div .cell")[0].parentNode.querySelector(".primary.high.normal").textContent)}else if(nameError.length>0){if(isNaN(nameError.val())!==true||hasNumber(nameError.val())!==true)pushEvent(category,"Ingresar datos de quien recibe :: "+stepPage,nameError.closest("div .cell")[0].parentNode.querySelector(".primary.high.normal").textContent)}else if(lastnameError.length>0){if(isNaN(lastnameError.val())!==true||hasNumber(lastnameError.val())!==
true)pushEvent(category,"Ingresar datos de quien recibe :: "+stepPage,lastnameError.closest("div .cell")[0].parentNode.querySelector(".primary.high.normal").textContent)}else if(phoneError.length>0){if(phoneError.val().length!==8||(isNaN(phoneError.val())!==false||phoneError.val()===""))pushEvent(category,"Ingresar datos de quien recibe :: "+stepPage,phoneError.closest("div .cell")[0].parentNode.querySelector(".primary.high.normal").textContent)}else if(dniError.length>0)if(dniError.closest("div .cell")[0].parentNode.querySelector(".primary.high.normal"))pushEvent(category,
"Ingresar datos de quien recibe :: "+stepPage,dniError.closest("div .cell")[0].parentNode.querySelector(".primary.high.normal").textContent)}catch(e){handleError(e)}})()}catch(e){}function pushEvent(c,a,l){try{c=cleanString(c);a=cleanString(a);l=cleanString(l);sendEvent(c,a,l)}catch(e){handleError(e)}}})();</script><script type="text/javascript" id="">(function(){var f=google_tag_manager["GTM-PQRB5NV"].macro(176),b=google_tag_manager["GTM-PQRB5NV"].macro(177),c=google_tag_manager["GTM-PQRB5NV"].macro(178),g=__NEXT_DATA__.page,d=[];try{mh$("body").on("click",function(a){a=mh$(a.target);if(a.closest(".SearchList-module_searchListItem__3-qFN").length)a={search_term:mh$(".SearchBar-module_searchBar__Input__1VvhT").attr("value"),typeahead:a.text().trim()},b("search",a);else if(a.closest(".UserActions-module_content-wrapper__2RUyB").find(".UserActions-module_utils-anchor__OsC-D").find(".UserActions-module_utils-span__1xiJs").length)a=
